SEARCH
Package org.bishopireton.files

Class MyFiles

java.lang.Object
java.io.File
org.bishopireton.files.MyFiles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<File>
public class MyFiles extends File
Provides a string reader/writer for a file using arrays. The class "isa" java File. Functionality provided includes counting lines in a file to determine how big to make the array when reading the file. Provides an open method for both reading and writing, a close method, and then one method to read the file into an array of Strings and another to write an array of Strings to the file.
Author:
Mrs. Kelly
